overview: The 30-Minutes to Fitness Body Shop DVD consists of two full-body workouts. Each workout burns maximum calories as it sculpts, lengthens, and re-shapes the entire body. Kelly Coffey-Meyer, fitness professional, utilizes traditional dumbbell exercises and compound movements with fresh and effective variations. These workouts have smooth transitions and a non-stop pace to keep you motivated and challenged. Every 30-Minutes to Fitness DVD includes numerous versions of the original workouts known as pre-mixes. These special pre-mixes are included to provide you with additional workout options to keep your workouts fresh and versatile. Getting fit in 30 minutes never felt this good! Equipment needed: dumbbells.
title: 30 Minutes to Fitness Body Shop
